general.description:
Lalerin is a small mainly oceanic moon around a gas giant. Its continents are green with vast forests suitable for sshaad life and its oceans are full of very lively ecosystems, all with a good biocompatibility to sshaad-like life.
It has been colonized by a small party of Daneb Anarchs who choose to settle planetside. Their initially open-minded culture made them eager to join the Candidate Systems when the new State was born.
The planet has always had contacts with other sentients and has evolved into a reputable leisure resort, despite poor biocompatibility to their nearest neighbours, the Humans and K'Rinns of the Shadow Complex.
general.bar: Groups of Sshaads and Shapeshifters, most of the latter mimicing Sshaads but a few relaxed on their natural form, play along other sentients
